name: Personalizedbedtimestories
0:
”Alexa, ask animal stories to read me a story”
”Alexa, open animal stories”
”Alexa, ask animal stories to read a story for Ryan”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal stories
des: Cute animal stories for young kids. These are very good bedtime stories for kids. These stories have sound effects for animals which are fun for kids. You can provide a name to make it personalized story and a kid can be part of the story. These stories also have a learning from the story in the end.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
